QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, cmn_notification_defs.id odf_pk, cmn_notification_defs.CODE as code, cmn_notification_defs.OBJECT_TYPE as object_type, cmn_notification_defs.SUBJECT as subject, cmn_notification_defs.PARENT_OBJECT_TYPE as parent_object_type, cmn_notification_defs.DESCRIPTION as description, cmn_notification_defs.IS_SIMPLE as simple, cmn_notification_defs.MESSAGE as message, cmn_notification_defs.priority as priority, created.full_name as created_by, cmn_notification_defs.NAME as name, updated.full_name as updated_by, created.created_date as created_date, updated.last_updated_date as last_updated_date from cmn_notification_defs cmn_notification_defs JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=cmn_notification_defs.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=cmn_notification_defs.last_updated_by where 1 = 1
